properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So long I sought You, my Lord and my God. My seeking ended: at last I found You. I found You right here within Your house. I will lift up my hands unto Your name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your lovingkindness is better than life. Your lovingkindness is better than life.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My lips shall praise You Thus will I bless You I will lift up my hands Unto Your name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I lift my hands up unto the Lord. I lift my hands up unto the Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Iâ€™m overshadowed by Your mighty wings. With joyful lips, Lord, I offer You praise, For You hold me, secure in Your right hand I will lift up my hands unto Your name.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Your precious blood flows to cover my sins. Your precious blood flows to cover my sins.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am set free now, for You are within, I am set free now, for You are within.{/lang-eng}
